content.description: Start sitting on the trail to the left of the boulder as you look at it from the trail.  Move up easy hand holds and obvious footholds.  Move up to the lowest part of the boulder.   Builds confidence especially for those tag-alongs who you want to get into the sport!
content.location: The smallish Farmhouse boulder which is a really unique landmark feature right on the trail (but it is pretty short as Jon Marek states).

content.description: Start sitting on the boulder protruding beneath the overhang. Move up the overhang and face. Crux is a set of two finger crimps.
content.protection: pads, the boulder beneath this climb is a butt-buster.
content.location: Left side of overhanging arete which sits on the trail about 25 yds downhill from the large slab.

content.description: Start sitting on the trail to the right of the boulder as you look from the trail.. but sit -left- of the rock holding the boulder on its south west side slightly beneath the rock.  Stay exclusively on the boulder (especially your right foothold as you start).  Move up to the highest part of the boulder.   Crux is getting to your 1st or 2nd hand holds.
content.protection: pad but have someone spot you behind the rock and next to the tree in case you peel to your right
content.location: -The- smallish Farmhouse boulder which is a really unique landmark feature right on the trail (but it is pretty short as Jon Marek states).

content.description: Start left of Hanging Dihedral and strait up the face using the good holds on the arete.
content.location: NW of the Farmhouse boulder, 20ft from the trail.

content.description: Sit start in dirty finger crack and up the dihedral.
content.location: 20 feet uphill from the trail NW of the Farmhouse Boulder.

climbs.name: Bullwinkle aka God Created Gene Hackman

content.description: Sit start on the trail, up and left on good holds.
content.location: Obvious overhanging line on the trail.

content.description: Sit start in crack, continue up crack until you reach the face which should take you to the top.
content.location: 8ft right of Rocky and Bullwinkle, on the same mini-buttress.

content.description: Shady. This is a fun area with some good problems.
